text_errata:
After you play this attack, you cannot play cards for the rest of the turn.

First Enhance Commit all of your ready foundations: This attack gets +1 speed for each foundation committed (maximum 5) and +1 damage for every 2 attacks with the word "Smash" in its name in your discard pile.

All Might Enhance: If this attack is blocked by an action card, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

name: Mr. Compress
text_errata:
Response Commit: After you block an attack, add your block to your momentum.

Form Lose 1 health: Reveal 1 momentum. If it is not a copy of a card you have played this turn, you may try to play it as your next form.

name: Innsmouth
text_errata:
Response Discard 1 card: After you play a Ranged or Slam attack, it gets +3 damage. Add the top card of your rival's deck to their card pool.

Enhance [Once per turn, your turn] Discard 1 card from your rival's card pool: Commit 1 rival foundation.

name: Kota
text_errata:
While this card is in your stage, if you are dealt 6 or more damage by an attack, destroy this card.

Response Commit: After you completely block an attack, your rival's next check to play a card gets -2. Failing that check does not end the Combat Phase.

Enhance Lose 1 health: Your {attacklow} or {water} attack gets +1 speed.

name: League Of Villains Bar
text_errata:
While this card is ready in your stage, attacks get -1 speed.

Response Discard 1 card: After you check a character card with a different identity than your starting character, add 1 card that shares 3 symbols with it from your discard pile to your hand.

Deadlock Enhance Commit: Add your attack to your hand.

name: Valiant Assault
text_errata:
Combo Enhance: Draw 2 cards.

Enhance: If this attack deals damage, look at the top card of your deck. You may add that card to the bottom of your deck.

name: A Refreshing Slice
text_errata: Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Your rival commits 1 foundation. Only playable while committed.

name: Magne
text_errata:
Enhance: If this attack's damage is an even number, it gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

Enhance: If this attack's damage is an odd number, it gets -1 speed and -1 damage.

Response [Once per turn] Commit 1 foundation: After you completely block your rival's attack, it does not clear during the End Phase.

name: I AM HERE!
text_errata:
First Form: Add the top 3 cards of your deck to your card pool. Reveal 1 of them at random and discard all other cards from your card pool. If you revealed an attack, try to play it as your next form and it gets +3 speed. Otherwise, build the revealed card face up or face down.

Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals 10 minus your hand size.

name: Teamwork
text_errata:
Response: After you block with this card, your next block ignores progressive difficulty.

Enhance: If you have 5 or more different symbols in your card pool, this attack gets +5 damage.

name: Suited Up
text_errata:
You may commit or destroy this card as if it was a foundation to pay costs.

Response [Once per Enhance Step]: After the speed of an attack is modified, it gets +1 or -1 speed. Only playable while committed.

Response [Once per Enhance Step]: After the damage of an attack is modified, it gets +1 or -1 damage.

name: Dark Shadow Behemoth
text_errata:
Enhance Remove 3 Ally cards from your discard pile: Ready 1 Ally card in your stage.

Response Remove 5 Ally cards from your discard pile: After your rival plays a response ability, they lose 2 health.

Enhance Remove 8 Ally cards from your discard pile: If this attack deals damage, commit all rival assets and foundations.

name: Full Cowling Impact
text_errata:
Response: After this attack is completely blocked, your rival destroys 1 foundation.

Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each card in your rival's hand.

name: Insidious Advance
text_errata:
Enhance: If your rival has failed a check this turn, they lose 2 health. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.

Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage. Your rival's next check this turn gets -2.

name: Red Guard
text_errata:
Response Flip 1 foundation: After you block with this card, the blocked attack deals no damage.

Enhance Flip 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.

name: Rising Engine Kick
text_errata:
Enhance: Your next Kick gets -2 difficulty.

Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage. Your rival discards 1 momentum.

name: All Smiles
text_errata:
Response Destroy: After your rival plays the same ability on the same foundation for the 2nd or greater time this Combat Phase, destroy it.

Response Flip: After your rival gains health due to their non-character ability, they lose 2 health.

name: City-Wide Crisis
text_errata:
Response [Your turn] Commit: After your rival adds 1 or more cards to their hand due to their non-character effect, they add 1 card from their hand to their card pool face down.

Enhance Remove: Return this attack to its printed speed. Playable while committed.

name: Desperate Struggle
text_errata:
Response Flip: After your rival's attack gets a damage bonus, return it to its printed damage.

Response Flip: After your rival's attack gets a speed bonus, return it to its printed speed.

name: Eraser Head (III)
text_errata:
Your "Eraser Head" cards get -3 difficulty.

Enhance: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage for each non-attack card in your card pool. If this is the second time you have played this ability this turn, your next attack ignores progressive difficulty.

Response: After you play a character card, draw 2 cards and seal 1 rival foundation.

name: Izuku Midoriya (III)
text_errata:
Enhance: This Kick or Punch attack gets +1 damage for each character card in your stage.

Response [Once per turn]: After you play a Kick or Punch card, it gains Breaker: 2 or Stun: 2 if it does not have that keyword already.

Enhance [Once per game]: Draw 1 card for each character card in your stage.

name: Katsuki Bakugo (III)
text_errata:
Enhance Discard 1 "Katsuki Bakugo" card from your hand: Your attack gets +2 damage. You may remove 1 Fury attack from your card pool.

Enhance Flip 3 foundations [Once per turn]: Draw 2 cards. Only playable if you have less cards in your hand than your rival.

name: Shoto Todoroki (III)
text_errata:
Enhance Discard 1 character card from your stage: Commit and freeze 1 rival foundation.

Enhance [Once per turn]: This attack gets +X or -X damage. X equals the number of your rival's committed foundations (maximum 5).

name: Get Loud
text_errata:
Combo Enhance: Your rival discards the top X cards of their deck. This attack gets +X speed. X equals the highest printed difficulty of a non-attack card in your card pool.

Enhance Add 1 card from your stage to your card pool: Draw 1 card.

name: Quick Thinking
text_errata: Enhance Remove 1 ready foundation: Build 1 non-Unique card with a check value of 5 or 6 from your discard pile.

name: Rushing In
text_errata: Enhance: Choose 1 card in your stage. This attack gets +1 speed for each copy of that card in your stage.

name: Shocking Entrance
text_errata:
Enhance: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if this is the only card in your card pool.

Enhance Discard 1 card: Add 1 character or asset card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: All Might's Mentorship
text_errata:
This card does not count towards progressive difficulty to play attacks.

Response [Card Pool]: After an attack deals damage, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

name: Asui's Friendship
text_errata: Response Commit: After your Ranged attack deals damage, your rival commits 2 foundations.

name: Kirishima's Assistance
text_errata: Response Flip: After your rival partially blocks your attack, seal their block.

name: Uraraka's Encouragement
text_errata:
First Form Remove: Search your deck for 1 character and add it to your hand.

First Form Remove: Add 1 non-Unique foundation from your discard pile to your hand.

name: All Might (VII)
text_errata:
Enhance: Your Ranged or Weapon attack gets +2 speed.

Response [Once per turn]: After your attack deals 6 or more damage, draw 2 cards.

Response: After you block an attack for the third time this turn, commit your rival's character.

name: Bursting Muscle Bash
text_errata:
Response [Card pool] Flip 1 attack in your card pool: After your rival builds a card during the Combat Phase, destroy it.

Enhance: If you have 3 or more counters on your character, draw 1 card. You may remove 1 counter from your character to draw 1 card.

name: Dreaming of the Reward
text_errata:
Enhance Commit: Before the Block Step of this attack, reveal 1 momentum. You may try to block this attack with the revealed momentum.

Toga/Twice Response Flip, add 1 card from your hand to your card pool face down: After your non-Throw attack deals damage, add it to your hand.

name: The Future Is Now!
text_errata: Form: Your next attack gets +2 speed, +2 damage and ignores progressive difficulty. Only 1 copy of this ability can be played per turn.

name: Masterminding
text_errata:
This card cannot be discarded from your momentum to pay costs.

Response: After your rival fails a check, add this card to your momentum face up. Only 1 copy of this response can be played per turn.

Enhance [Momentum, once per turn]: Your rival's next check gets -1. Failing that check does not end the Combat Phase.

name: Run Away!
text_errata: Response Lose X health: Before the Damage Step of your rival's unblocked attack, it deals no damage. Add the top card of your rival's discard pile to their card pool. X equals the attack's printed damage.

name: Gran Torino Agency
text_errata:
While this card is ready in your stage, attacks get +1 speed.

Response Commit: After an attack leaves your card pool during the Combat Phase, draw 1 card.

Enhance Destroy: You may use any Kick attack in your hand to block this attack as if it had a +0 mid block modifier.

name: Blazing Icicle
text_errata:
Response [Card Pool] Flip 1 foundation: After your Ranged attack deals 4 or more damage, freeze 1 rival foundation.

Enhance: If this attack has received a speed and damage bonus, draw 1 card.

name: Create: Insulation Cloth
text_errata:
Response [Card Pool] Flip: After your rival plays a non-character ability that commits or seals a card in your stage, cancel it.

First Enhance Add 1 foundation to your card pool: Your next Weapon attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage.

name: Dark Shadow Surge
text_errata:
Combo Enhance: Destroy 1 rival foundation. Discard the top card of your rival's deck. If the discarded card is an attack, they build the top card of their deck.

Response [Card Pool]: After your rival discards momentum to pay a cost, they lose 2 health. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.

name: Dupe-Plex
text_errata:
Enhance: If this attack deals 5 or more damage, build 1 character card from your discard pile.

Twice First Enhance: This attack gains Throw.

name: One For All 1,000,000% Delaware Detroit Smash
text_errata: Enhance Discard your hand: This attack gains Powerful: x. X equals your momentum plus 1. You cannot play attacks for the rest of this turn.

name: Throwing Knife Lunge
text_errata:
Response [Card Pool]: After your Weapon attack deals damage, your rival loses 1 health.

Enhance [Card Pool] Flip: If your rival has lost 5 or more health this turn, destroy 1 rival asset or foundation.

name: Haughty
text_errata:
Enhance Flip: If your attack's damage is 10 or more, ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

Enhance Discard 1 momentum: If this is your first attack this turn, and your rival has 10 or less health, your non-Throw attack gets +5 damage.

name: Drowning In Resentment
text_errata:
Enhance Flip: This Stun attack gets +2 or -2 damage. Playable while committed.

Response Flip: After a card leaves a discard pile due to your rival's non-character effect, they add the top card of their deck to their card pool face down.

name: Forcing Surrender
text_errata:
Response Flip: After you play a Combo ability, your rival discards 1 momentum.

Enhance Flip: Discard 1 non-attack card from either player's card pool.

name: High Value Target
text_errata:
When committing cards to pass a check to play a block, this card counts as 2 foundations.

Response: Before 1 of your foundations would be destroyed due to a rival effect, destroy this foundation instead.

name: Infinite Potential
text_errata: Response Flip: After your rival plays an attack, change its zone to high.

name: League Interview
text_errata:
First Form Discard the top 2 cards of your deck: Your next check to play an attack gets +1.

Response Flip: After you make a check to block, that check gets +1.
